遊び方に気を付ければ、楽しめるゲームです。
勝とうとすると無限にストレスが溜まるため、たまに勝てるくらいで満足できる人向けです。
BPアップや周年記念期間にプレイして、期間が終わったら引退を繰り返すのがベストな遊び方ではないでしょうか。
悪い点に纏めた内容を許容できる方はやり込んでも良いと思います。

[h1]良い点[/h1]
・ホラー対戦ゲームの中でもお手軽にプレイできる
・時間さえかければ無課金でもある程度キャラを揃えられる
・1000時間以上プレイしてもやる事や試したい事がある

[h1]悪い点[/h1]
・様々な要素でキラーに厳しすぎる(書ききれない、勧められない、調整に期待できない)
・バグが多すぎる(書ききれないし多数隠蔽されている)
・民度が低い(煽り、暴言、人間性を疑う名前など)

[h1]それでも[/h1]
ゲーム自体は良いんです。
ただバランスが致命的に悪くバグ多数なだけで、運営がキラーイジメをやめると面白いゲームになると思います。

サバイバーの方は、誰も吊られていない状態で出口に着いたらすぐ脱出してください。
その間キラーは無意味な待機時間を強制され、やる気も無くなり、結果的にマッチ待機時間が伸びてしまいます。

キラーの方は、全滅を狙わず「全員吊れたら勝ち」くらいの目標でゆるくプレイしてください。
詳しくは書きませんが、上手くなろうとするべきではあるものの、負けて当たり前なんです。

Game will say got worse. Did a positive review back in June when I actually enjoyed the game. Now everything is kinda bad, no more endurance stack. If the killer has high ping and still good at the game then you will lose. Killer buff is just to good and still a lot of problems with the game. Bugs take awhile to get fix if there's not everyone telling them to fix it. Right now best killer is probably Legion cause he counters every endurance perks. I suggest playing with 4 people if you are willing to have "fun" in this game. Don't mind the many killers such has Doctor spamming there ability just so that you keep getting hit every 1.5 seconds with it. Not to say that Nurse in the other hand can catch up to everyone on the map. If the map is small, she can get there from one gate to the other in no time. Every Killer has there cons and pros. But most of them are just unfair. There excuses to all of this is literally "Get better". Play this game if you want. But don't forget that after a few hours on it. It will not be fun.

horrifically unbalanced, very little to no amount of skill involved, there's no "winning" in this game. it's not fun most of the time even with friends. the asymmetry is unappealing and the answer is not continuously nerfing both sides but that's what keeps happening. most of the killers aren't fun to play against, just annoying. scummy killer play (camping, tunneling etc.) is considered a legit strategy, the devs acknowledged this and don't care if the person being targeted isn't having fun, they're like "just do gens." survivors BM way too much for absolutely no reason, most negative and hateful community i've ever seen. yet i'm addicted all the same like a toxic relationship. so no i would not recommend this game to anyone despite my hours. (i have about 2k console hours) and every other person i know who plays this game regularly also hates it so there's definitely something wrong with that.

This game is really interesting, having an unbalanced game where the players each have their disadvantages and advantages, while neither being inherently unfun.
Killer: First person, able to hurt and actively inhibit the opposing team, alone, a vast variety of powers to use against the survivors
Survivors: Third person, with three other people, unable to actively fight against the killer (but are able to slow and outsmart them), each survivor is essentially a reskin of another however.

My biggest problem is the fact that the survivors are the exact same besides the personal perks each one gains. The fix I recommend is to have a tier three perk as a passive to the survivors, allowing for essentially five perks for them to use. The perks do have to be balanced however, for example Leon Kennedy would have Flashbang as a passive and Bill would have Borrowed time, but characters like Feng Min would NOT have Lithe as a passive, as that would be too unbalanced, and all the survivors would choose her instead. Alternatively, have a reason to play a certain survivor over another, like certain survivors having certain "classes", like Dwight and Claudette being a teamwork focused class, while Jill and Leon have a killer sabotage class, which each class having a certain buff. Teamwork has an aura buff, and the sabotage class has an unhooking buff. (I got this idea from the forums, shout-out to Dreamnomad on the DBD forum)

TL;DR: Game is good, play survivor in the day and killer at night

Разработчики бездарные чудики, им только тетрис разрабатывать. После обновы я теперь на своем мониторе 16:10 должен играть с черными полосами сверху и снизу. Хочешь играть нормально? Покупай 16:9 монитор (почти точный ответ разработчиков). Хочешь поменять разрешение в игре? Лезь в кфг и танцуй с бубном чтобы работало. Про баланс я вообще молчу(его нет). А игре, ни много ни мало, 6 лет. Единственная игра студии и то с которой они не в состоянии справиться. Что бы вас, разрабы, каждую игру бубас в подвале кемпил.
